DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America . The aim trial investigate Safety , Tolerability , PK PD Multiple Doses NNC9204-0530 Male Female Subjects overweight obesity
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Safety , Tolerability , PK PD Multiple Doses NNC9204-0530 Male Female Subjects Being Overweight With Obesity
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body mass index 25.0 39.9 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) screening . Haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal 6.5 % Any clinically significant weight change ( equal 5 % selfreported change ) dieting attempt ( e.g . participation organize weight reduction program ) within last 90 day prior screen Any prior obesity surgery currently present gastrointestinal implant . Abnormal ECG ( electrocardiogram ) result include 2nd 3rd degree AVblock , prolongation QRS complex 120 m , QTcF interval 430 m ( male ) 450 m ( female ) , clinically relevant abnormal result , judge investigator A history additional risk factor Torsades de pointes ( e.g. , heart failure , hypokalaemia , family history Long QT Syndrome ) History pancreatitis ( acute chronic )
